headline.main: Limos and Fine Food: Ah, It's a Dog's Life

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: RHETT eats only high-protein food, and never considers leftovers. Every week, he visits a salon for a long, soothing bath and to have his hair done. To stay fit, he frolics in a glass-enclosed, air-conditioned exercise area in his roomy Atlanta home. Alternate weekends, he hops into the Jeep and zooms to a mountain cabin in Cashiers, N.C.
